Dear @STsiodras @VanaSypsa @dparask69 @myrtani @PGoggolidou @georgepavlakis (WHO's position for #AztraZeneca's #COVID19 #vaccine: vaccinate those 65 and above). 

There is a difference between mild disease, and, well, death. Full @WHO SAGE recommendations: https://t.co/R3oLGYrEk1 https://t.co/Cu8b0So1Hc
